title.english: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs

description:
Kogarashi Fuyuzora is a "hands on" psychic. Ever since the day he got possessed by an evil ghost, he has been burdened with debt. Needing a cheap room to rent, he winds up at a haunted hot springs inn, Yuragi Inn, where only incredibly beautiful girls reside. Amongst the residents is a ghost, Yuuna, who cannot move on to the spirit world. Despite the resistance from the current tenants that are all girls, Kogarashi manages to start his new life at Yuragi Inn.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ยูรากิโซ ที่นี่ผีน่ารักนะ

title.native: ゆらぎ荘の幽奈さん OVA

alternative: Black Dragon God of Shinao's Dragon Grace Lake

node.description: Born on January. [tosh](https://anilist.co/staff/106085) was his assistant.

__[Website](http://kikuyatomoki.com/)__

__Birthplace:__ Mitaka, Tokyo, Japan

__Introduction:__
Tomoki Kikuya is a Japanese composer and arranger, who works for music studio Popholic. His brother Kikuya Hiroki (菊谷宏樹), is the director of TVK's saku saku music show.

__Biography:__
Kikuya started a career as guitarist in the music band Mustang A.K.A under Sony Records. Later he was part of Funanori. Starting from 2005 Kikuya decided to focus on working as a music composer and arranger. He has arranged and composed several songs featured in anime since then, starting with theme songs for Pani Poni Dash.

Luna Haruna is a punk/loli reader model of KERA magazine. She was a finalist in the 4th Animax Anisong Grand Prix as Aya Itou (伊藤彩).  

[Blog](https://ameblo.jp/harunaluna-official) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/luna_galaxy) | [Official Website](https://www.harunaluna.jp/)

Akio Takami is an animator, animation supervisor and character designer. Originally a member of Ashi Productions, he joined Xebec in the 90s, where he participated in most of Xebec's works and became one of the key people at the studio.
Masaharu Yamanouchi is a music producer.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).
**Nobuoki Kinoshita** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mikadonokemuri)

Rights agent and producer at Shueisha.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/88151202)

Nobuhiro Nakayama is a producer belonging to [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Formerly [Geneon Universal Entertainment](https://anilist.co/studio/31/), then [Warner Bros.](https://anilist.co/studio/415/)
